# Welcome to the DP-Next theme website

The [DP-Next theme](https://github.com/dp-next/dp-next-theme) is a
[Quarto brand extension](https://quarto.org/docs/extensions/brand.html),
that is used across DP-Next websites. The extension provides the theme's
styling (brand) as well as default website settings, such as the
navigation bar, search bar, and page footer.

Explore the guide to learn how to use the DP-Next theme in your project,
how to contribute to the project, and see a few examples of how to use
the theme's features.
